D

DateAction - Class in com.datamelt.rules.core.action
Class containing possible actions that are related to dates.
DateAction() - Constructor for class com.datamelt.rules.core.action.DateAction
 
decimalHoursToHoursMinutes(XmlAction, float) - Method in class com.datamelt.rules.core.action.DateAction
calculates the hours and minutes from a decimal representation of hours and outputs the result as a string formatted as: hh:mm note that the seconds part (if present) will be stripped away.
decimalHoursToHoursMinutesSeconds(XmlAction, float) - Method in class com.datamelt.rules.core.action.DateAction
calculates the hours and minutes and seconds from a decimal representation of hours and outputs the result as a string formatted as: hh:mm:ss example: 41.5 hours = 41:30:00
decimalHoursToMinutes(XmlAction, float) - Method in class com.datamelt.rules.core.action.DateAction
calculates the number of minutes from a decimal representation of hours.
decimalHoursToSeconds(XmlAction, float) - Method in class com.datamelt.rules.core.action.DateAction
calculates the number of seconds from a decimal representation of hours.
DEFAULT_DATE_FORMAT - Static variable in class com.datamelt.rules.core.action.DateAction
